statements: SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT episode, rewards FROM training_data WHERE steps > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT episode FROM training_data WHERE rewards > 50;
SELECT id, steps, actions FROM training_data WHERE observation LIKE '%obstacle%';
SELECT id, episode, rewards FROM training_data WHERE episode = 5;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT episode, rewards FROM training_data WHERE steps > 100 ORDER BY rewards DESC;
SELECT id, episode, steps, actions FROM training_data WHERE episode BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, SUM(rewards) AS total_rewards FROM training_data GROUP BY id HAVING total_rewards > 500;
SELECT id, episode, actions FROM training_data WHERE observation LIKE '%obstacle%' AND observation NOT LIKE '%clear%' ORDER BY episode DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT episode_id, action, reward FROM training_data WHERE episode_id = 5 ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT id, training_date, action FROM training_data WHERE reward > 0;
SELECT * FROM episode WHERE total_reward >= 1000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT episode_id, SUM(reward) AS total_reward FROM training_data GROUP BY episode_id HAVING total_reward > 500;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, action, reward FROM training_data WHERE reward > 100.0 ORDER BY reward DESC;
SELECT episode_id, COUNT(id) AS total_actions FROM training_data GROUP BY episode_id;
SELECT t.*, e.total_reward FROM training_data t JOIN episode e ON t.episode_id = e.episode_id;
SELECT MAX(reward) AS max_reward, MIN(reward) AS min_reward FROM training_data;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM users WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT training_type, success_rate FROM training_sessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, user_id, training_session_id, session_date FROM training_data WHERE user_id = 202 AND training_session_id = 305;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_data ORDER BY session_date DESC, id
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE user_id = 1001 AND training_session_id = 2002
SELECT session_id, training_type, session_duration FROM training_sessions WHERE success_rate > 80 ORDER BY session_date DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS session_count FROM training_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM training_data;
SELECT episode_number, reward FROM training_data ORDER BY episode_number DESC;
SELECT action FROM training_data WHERE reward > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM rewards LIMIT 5;
SELECT action_name FROM actions ORDER BY action_name ASC;
SELECT id, episode_number, action FROM training_data WHERE reward > 0.5 ORDER BY episode_number DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT episode_number, MAX(reward) AS max_reward FROM training_data GROUP BY episode_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY max_reward DESC;
SELECT actions.action_name, COUNT(*) AS action_count FROM actions INNER JOIN training_data ON actions.id = training_data.id GROUP BY actions.action_name ORDER BY action_count DESC;
SELECT start_time, end_time FROM episodes WHERE episode_number IN (SELECT DISTINCT episode_number FROM rewards WHERE reward_value > 0.8) ORDER BY start_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT episode_number, COUNT(*) AS episode_count FROM episodes GROUP BY episode_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY episode_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_data;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_details ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT action_name, action_description FROM action_types WHERE action_id = 2;
SELECT training_id, reward FROM reward_history WHERE reward_value > 0 ORDER BY training_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT model_id FROM model_parameters;
SELECT * FROM training_data;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_details WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT action_name, action_description FROM action_types WHERE action_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT player_name, join_date, player_level FROM player_details ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT model_id, learning_rate, discount_factor FROM model_parameters WHERE exploration_rate < 0.3;
